§oEver wanted your pipes to look §leven§r§o cooler? Now you can!§r

Fluid and Item Pipes can be placed inside of Frameboxes, giving them an §6absolutely breathtaking§r appearance!

Simply Right Click a frame onto a pipe or a pipe onto a frame, and you're done!

§bLore:§r This is a GTCEu-original mechanic!
